item.description:
I have only been out once this season and need to get out and enjoy the snow. It is Valentine's weekend and may be a little crowded, but the earlier we get there the better. There is something there for all experience levels - check out the website for more information. So far the weather looks great - sunny and 30 degrees. Hope to see ya there!

From Providence (1 1/4 hours)
Take Rt. 146 North to Rt. 290 East to Rt. 190 North. Take Exit 5 Rt. 140 North nine miles to a left onto Mile Hill Rd. and travel 1/2 mile to the Ski Area entrance on the right.

http://www.wachusett....
item.name: Wachusett Mountain - Snowboard/Ski
